meanings.definition: A type of insect known for its loud, shrill sound.
meanings.sent1: The cicale chirped loudly in the hot summer sun.
meanings.sent2: I heard the cicale singing in the trees as I walked through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cicale decided to hold a singing competition with the crickets.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a cicale, piercing through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cicale was so high-pitched, it echoed in the valley.
